{"id":835606364,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1667419746,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/835606364/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int n = size(nums);\n        vector<vector<int>>res;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<n; i++){\n            if(i>0 && nums[i] == nums[i-1]) continue;\n            // cout<<i<<endl;\n            int left = i + 1, right = n - 1;\n            while(left < right){\n                int sum = nums[i] + nums[left] + nums[right];\n                if(sum < 0) left++;\n                else if(sum > 0) right--;\n                else{\n                    res.push_back({nums[i], nums[left++], nums[right--]});\n                    while(nums[left] == nums[left+1] && left<right) left++;\n                    while(nums[right] == nums[right-1] && left<right) right--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
